name: @nanalogue/gui
description: GUI tools for nanopore data analysis

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:renderer && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:renderer: npm run build:landing && npm run build:swipe && npm run build:qc && npm run build:locate
scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy:shared && npm run copy:landing && npm run copy:swipe && npm run copy:qc && npm run copy:locate
scripts.copy:shared: mkdir -p dist/renderer/shared && cp src/renderer/shared/styles.css node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.umd.js node_modules/chartjs-plugin-annotation/dist/chartjs-plugin-annotation.min.js dist/renderer/shared/
scripts.copy:landing: mkdir -p dist/renderer/landing && cp src/renderer/landing/landing.html src/renderer/landing/landing.css dist/renderer/landing/
scripts.copy:swipe: mkdir -p dist/renderer/swipe && cp src/renderer/swipe/swipe.html src/renderer/swipe/swipe-config.html src/renderer/swipe/swipe-config.css dist/renderer/swipe/
scripts.copy:qc: mkdir -p dist/renderer/qc && cp src/renderer/qc/*.html src/renderer/qc/*.css dist/renderer/qc/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy:locate: mkdir -p dist/renderer/locate && cp src/renderer/locate/*.html src/renderer/locate/*.css dist/renderer/locate/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lint: biome check src/ && eslint src/ && stylelint "src/**/*.css" && html-validate "src/**/*.html"
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --write src/ && eslint --fix src/ && stylelint --fix "src/**/*.css"

author: Sathish Thiyagarajan
